body:
I just tried to install https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.6.windows-amd64.msi on

OS Name:                   Microsoft Windows 7 Professional
OS Version:                6.1.7601 Service Pack 1 Build 7601

and everything works for me as expected. Given that your PATH looks OK now, perhaps, there is some confusion on your part. See https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/20150915-00/?p=91591 for details (quoting Raymond Chen is my pasttime, sorry).

I am not sure there is anything else we can do to help future users.

Alex
